subtitle: Land the Starship safely!
description:
Experience the thrill of landing a Starship rocket on a platform in this addictive physics-based game!

Inspired by real SpaceX Starship landings, test your piloting skills as you guide your rocket through a controlled descent. Manage your thrust carefully, control your rotation, and stick the landing on the platform!

FEATURES:
• Authentic Starship-inspired rocket design with flaps and landing legs
• Realistic physics-based controls
• Retro 16-bit sound effects
• Skill-based scoring system rewarding fuel efficiency and precision
• High score leaderboard to track your best landings
• Simple touch controls - master the thrust!

SCORING:
Your score depends on multiple factors:
• Fuel efficiency - Save fuel for bigger bonuses!
• Soft landing - Touch down gently
• Precision - Land in the center of the platform
• Control - Keep your Starship upright

Can you achieve the perfect landing? Every attempt is different with randomized platform positions. Download now and see if you have what it takes to land a Starship!

Max score: ~1450 points. Can you beat it?
whatIsNew:
Initial release of Starship Lander!

• Starship-inspired rocket design
• 16-bit retro sound effects
• Skill-based scoring system
• High score leaderboard
